name: Drill Game OUYA Edition
description:
Santa needs help mining minerals at the North Pole but is short on elf miners.  

A clone of the flash game Motherload developed with Godot 2.1.4 for the OUYA console.  If you have an OUYA and would like to play this, make sure to follow the instructions here first.

OUYA Controls:

Left stick - Move/Fly/Drill

Y - Open inventory

Right stick (click) - Pause

Left bumper - Use reserve fuel tank

Right bumper - Use nanobots

D-Pad up - Use dynamite

D-Pad down - Use plastic explosive

D-Pad left - Use quantum teleporter

D-Pad right - Use matter transmitter

Windows Controls:

W/A/S/D - Move/Fly/Drill

I - Open inventory

P - Pause

1 - 6 - Use equipment

Alternatively, you can use a controller on the Windows version.  The OUYA's buttons map like so on an Xbox controller:

O = A

A = B

Y = Y

U = X

This game utilizes a lot of great assets:

Mineral icons
